definition: A formal decision or resolution made by a group or organization, typically after discussion or deliberation. It is commonly used in legal, political, or administrative contexts to refer to an official decision or ruling reached by a governing body, committee, or assembly.

examples.german: Der Vorstand hat einen Beschluss gefasst.
examples.english: The board has made a decision.

examples.german: Der Beschluss des Gerichts ist endgültig.
Der Beschluss wird im Amtsblatt veröffentlicht.
examples.english: The resolution will be published in the official gazette.

examples.german: Der Beschluss des Stadtrats wurde kontrovers diskutiert.
examples.english: The city council's decision was controversially discussed.
